HTMLMediaElementBuffered.summary: The buffered read-only property of objects returns a new static normalized TimeRanges object that represents the ranges of the media resource, if any, that the user agent has buffered at the moment the buffered property is accessed.

remarks.para: -: Interface used to define the HTMLMediaElement.buffered property

HTMLMediaElementBuffered.value: A new static normalized TimeRanges object that represents the ranges of the media resource, if any, that the user agent has buffered at the moment the buffered property is accessed.
